title: Chapter 9: Ethical Considerations in AI and Robotics
description: As Physical AI and humanoid robotics advance, their capabilities extend beyond mere task execution to intricate interactions with human society. This brings forth a critical need to address the ethical implications of designing, deploying, and integrating these intelligent systems. This chapter explores the key ethical considerations that researchers, developers, policymakers, and the public must grapple with to ensure a responsible and beneficial future for AI and robotics.
